      • SBlack

        public SBlack(int serialNumber,
              int row,
              int col)
        it will call the super constructor in the Stormtrooperclass class; after that it will define the pattern the stormtrooper has to follow;
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - order of creation between stormtroopers;
        row - row position in the map;
        col - column position in the map;
